actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio, to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway. Authorizes appropriations from the Highway Trust Fund. Establishes the Federal share of the cost of the project at 80 percent. Exempts project funds from any obligation limitation.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio.
